page.title: 15 RIDING STABLES
page.content: In Park Lane there is a large riding stables with a house right next to it. Pat White owns it, along with her father.They have a paddock,a big wood, a field covering {22 acres} and a school where they train horses.There are stables where you can keep your own horses. There are also{6 ponies}and a lot of {horses}which may be used for riding lessons. Altogether at these stables there are {64 horses,}of all sizes to suit children of all ages, as well as adults. For each hour lesson the cost is Â£3.75. Sometimes the stables will organise their own{jumping shows}at the week-ends.Naturally the beginners are not allowed to take part in any of these jumping events. Apart from these occasions lessons are held every day of the week,except Sunday.
